title: I built Shurima in Minecraft
body:
http://i.imgur.com/SwNuird.jpg

Without the shoddy Photoshop job to change the color of the sky:

http://i.imgur.com/1H6lS85.jpg

There's a floor because Minecraft's height limit is only 256 blocks so I can't really do the bottom of the canyon

Imo the first one looks more Shurima-ish but the photoshopping is just too bad, which one do you prefer GD?
